com.conceptwave.scripting
Class MetadataActivity

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.MetadataIdentity
          com.conceptwave.scripting.MetadataActivity

public class MetadataActivity
extends MetadataIdentity

An Activity is a component that performs a specific function within a process. This class provide information about an activity in process flow.

Method Detail

getActivityPath

public String getActivityPath(String delim)
Parameters:
delimiter - character for the activity path. Only the first character of delimiter is used. If no delimiter is provided the default "/" is used.
Returns:
string representing full path to the current activity

getExpectedDueDate

public Date getExpectedDueDate(Process proc,
                               java.lang.Long orderId,
                               java.lang.Long orderItemId)
Calculate the expected due date of the activity by which it should complete.

Parameters:
proc - Business process object in which the activity is executed.
orderId - Order Id.
orderItemId - Order item Id.
Returns:
Specifies the amount of time (Date) in which the activity should complete.
